languages.text: "Старейшины так давно ждали знак небес... Да померли уж, за столько-то времени. Но пусть поразит меня Сам, если это не вы! В-вы же поможете нуждающимся во спасении, п-правда?" {n}Вир на секунду замирает, взирая на вас полными благоговения глазами и неуклюже переминаясь с ноги на ногу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Старейшины так давно ждали знак небес... Да померли уж, за столько-то времени. Но пусть поразит меня Сам, если это не вы! В-вы же поможете нуждающимся во спасении, п-правда?" {n}Вир на секунду замирает, взирая на вас полными благоговения глазами и неуклюже переминаясь с ноги на ногу.{/n}

languages.text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Старейшины так давно ждали знак небес... Да померли уж, за столько-то времени. Но пусть поразит меня Сам, если это не вы! В-вы же поможете нуждающимся во спасении, п-правда?" {n}Вир на секунду замирает, взирая на вас полными благоговения глазами и неуклюже переминаясь с ноги на ногу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may the Exalted One smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

"The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

languages.text: 「長老たちは天啓をずっと待ち望んでいました…でもあまりにも時が経ちすぎて、彼らは亡くなりました。でももし、あなたが選ばれし者でないのなら、神帝陛下よ、この卑しき私をお討ちくださいますように。す、救いを必要としている者を助けてくれるん…ですよね？」{n}ヴィルは一瞬凍りつき、畏敬の念を込めてあなたを見つめ、ぎこちなく足を動かした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「長老たちは天啓をずっと待ち望んでいました…でもあまりにも時が経ちすぎて、彼らは亡くなりました。でももし、あなたが選ばれし者でないのなら、神帝陛下よ、この卑しき私をお討ちくださいますように。す、救いを必要としている者を助けてくれるん…ですよね？」{n}ヴィルは一瞬凍りつき、畏敬の念を込めてあなたを見つめ、ぎこちなく足を動かした。{/n}

languages.text: « Les anciens ont longtemps attendu un signe du ciel... Mais le temps a passé, et ils sont morts. Mais qu'Il me foudroie sur place si vous n'êtes pas {mf|celui|celle} que nous attendions ! V-vous allez venir en aide à ceux qui ont besoin d'être secourus, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Vir s'interrompt un instant. Tout en continuant de piétiner inconfortablement, il vous adresse un regard plein de déférence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les anciens ont longtemps attendu un signe du ciel... Mais le temps a passé, et ils sont morts. Mais qu'Il me foudroie sur place si vous n'êtes pas {mf|celui|celle} que nous attendions ! V-vous allez venir en aide à ceux qui ont besoin d'être secourus, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Vir s'interrompt un instant. Tout en continuant de piétiner inconfortablement, il vous adresse un regard plein de déférence.{/n}

languages.text: “长老们一直在等待来自天国的预兆……他们等了那么久，直到死了也没等到。神皇保佑，你肯定就是那个人，对吧！你……你会帮助那些需要救赎的人，是……是这样吧？”{n}维尔愣了片刻，虔诚地看着你，笨拙地挪着脚。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “长老们一直在等待来自天国的预兆……他们等了那么久，直到死了也没等到。神皇保佑，你肯定就是那个人，对吧！你……你会帮助那些需要救赎的人，是……是这样吧？”{n}维尔愣了片刻，虔诚地看着你，笨拙地挪着脚。{/n}

languages.text: «Los ancianos llevan muchísimo tiempo esperando una señal de los cielos... Tanto que ya murieron. ¡Pero que el Altísimo me castigue si no es usted! A-ayudará a los faltos de salvación, ¿verdad?». {n}Vir se queda inmóvil un segundo, mirándote con reverencia y arrastrando torpemente los pies.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los ancianos llevan muchísimo tiempo esperando una señal de los cielos... Tanto que ya murieron. ¡Pero que el Altísimo me castigue si no es usted! A-ayudará a los faltos de salvación, ¿verdad?». {n}Vir se queda inmóvil un segundo, mirándote con reverencia y arrastrando torpemente los pies.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Ältesten warten schon so lange auf ein Zeichen des Himmels ... Es ist zu viel Zeit vergangen, also sind sie gestorben. Doch möge er mich niederstrecken, wenn Ihr es nicht seid! I-Ihr helft doch denen, die erlöst werden müssen, n-nicht wahr?" {n}Vir erstarrt kurz, blickt dich ehrfürchtig an und tritt verlegen auf der Stelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Ältesten warten schon so lange auf ein Zeichen des Himmels ... Es ist zu viel Zeit vergangen, also sind sie gestorben. Doch möge er mich niederstrecken, wenn Ihr es nicht seid! I-Ihr helft doch denen, die erlöst werden müssen, n-nicht wahr?" {n}Vir erstarrt kurz, blickt dich ehrfürchtig an und tritt verlegen auf der Stelle.{/n}

languages.text: "İhtiyarlar uzun zamandır göklerden işaret bekliyordu... O kadar uzun zaman geçti ki vefat ettiler. Fakat bekledikleri kişi siz değilseniz ben de ne olayım! S... Selamete ulaşmak isteyenlere yardım edeceksiniz, değil mi?" {n}Vir bir anlığına donup kalıyor, sana hürmetle bakarak ayağını tuhaf bir şekilde sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Elders have been waiting for a sign from the heavens for so long... Too much time has passed, so they died. But may He smite me if you are not the one! Y-you will help the ones in need of salvation, w-won't you?" {n}Vir freezes for a second, looking at you reverently and awkwardly shuffling his feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kadimler uzun zamandır göklerden bir işaret bekliyordu... O kadar uzun zaman geçti ki vefat ettiler. Fakat bekledikleri kişi siz değilseniz ben de ne olayım! Selamete ulaşmak isteyenlere siz yardım edeceksiniz, değil mi?" {n}Vir bir anlığına donup kalıyor, sana hürmetle bakarak ayağını tuhaf bir şekilde sallıyor.{/n}
